author: Xerbutri
title: Haunted Hotel
intro: In August 2007 I was on holiday in the Ardennes and I biked past this house. It must have been some kind of hotel. Because I find the house rather beautiful I imagine it must have been haunted and abandoned. The dogs weren't very nice, but they keep a distance, just keep staring at them and they will go away.
history: Nothing known about the history of this house.
